entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
